Package org.apache.hadoop.metrics2

Interface MetricHistogram

All Known Implementing Classes:
MutableHistogram, MutableRangeHistogram, MutableSizeHistogram, MutableTimeHistogram
@Private public interface MetricHistogram
Metrics Histogram interface. Implementing classes will expose computed quartile values through the metrics system.
